name: Garlic Bread (Molho de Alho)
author: kroito
summary: Great Brazilian churrasco barbeque-style garlic bread. You can mix oregano in with all the ingredients or sprinkle on bread before putting it on the grill. Shredded cheese can be added once one of the sides is cooked.
ingredients: 3 cloves garlic, or more to taste
directions: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Combine butter, mayonnaise, and garlic in a food processor; blend until smooth
Spread mixture on both sides of French bread slices
Toast on the preheated grill until browned and crispy, about 5 minutes per side
